about_the_game:
◆ Story


This is the time when Succubus began to appear from within people.
The battle between succubus and exorcist is becoming more and more fierce, triggered by the outpouring of miasma in the center of the continent.
The “Sanctuary”, a relic from before the disaster, has kept a dangerous equilibrium, but it is clear to everyone that this is a temporary peace.

An anomaly in the sanctuary was confirmed in the ruins on continental frontier
Three people, the witch Eleonora, the squire Sera, and the other witch Dorothy, took charge of the situation. There was no time to wait for more support.
In order to restart the stopped sanctuary as soon as possible, the three of them had to go into the dungeon where the miasma was spreading.

◆ Game Overview


In this roguelike action game, you'll take on a dungeon filled with miasma and curses in order to defeat and destroy the natural enemy of mankind known as the "Succubus".

With a part of three, you will proceed through a dungeon room by room. There is no turning back.
Manage your on-hand resources wisely and make your way to the darkest depths of the dungeon!

◆ Game Characteristics

  • 3 character party dungeon delving
  • losing characters / permanent death is a feature
  • new game+ allows you to start stronger with each playthrough

◆ Erotic Content Themes

  • real-time restraints and sexual violation in battle
  • almost all enemies will attempt to restrain any or sexually abuse the characters
  • characters will be weakened by sexual sensitivity, pleasure, and corruption

◆ Trial Version Specifications

  • Playable up to the fifth layer
  • Some events are omitted
  • No benefit from playing the game in a round-around manner
  • Save data cannot be transferred to the full version

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains nude women and sexual content. Sexual content in this game includes sexual assault/non-consensual sex, fantasy pregnancy, obscene jewelry and body paint. All characters in this game are 18 years of age or older.

detailed_description:
◆ Story


This is the time when Succubus began to appear from within people.
The battle between succubus and exorcist is becoming more and more fierce, triggered by the outpouring of miasma in the center of the continent.
The “Sanctuary”, a relic from before the disaster, has kept a dangerous equilibrium, but it is clear to everyone that this is a temporary peace.

An anomaly in the sanctuary was confirmed in the ruins on continental frontier
Three people, the witch Eleonora, the squire Sera, and the other witch Dorothy, took charge of the situation. There was no time to wait for more support.
In order to restart the stopped sanctuary as soon as possible, the three of them had to go into the dungeon where the miasma was spreading.

◆ Game Overview


In this roguelike action game, you'll take on a dungeon filled with miasma and curses in order to defeat and destroy the natural enemy of mankind known as the "Succubus".

With a part of three, you will proceed through a dungeon room by room. There is no turning back.
Manage your on-hand resources wisely and make your way to the darkest depths of the dungeon!

◆ Game Characteristics

  • losing characters / permanent death is a feature
  • new game+ allows you to start stronger with each playthrough

◆ Erotic Content Themes

  • characters will be weakened by sexual sensitivity, pleasure, and corruption

◆ Trial Version Specifications

name: Succubus Heaven Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A demo version of a roguelite 3D action game for adults that challenges the lair of lewd demons with a desperate fighting force. Designed to pinch the heroine, the game offers a "normal play and lose" experience despite being an adult game.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
